title: Health spending as percent of GDP in South Korea 2000 to 2018
summary: In general Percentage of GDP has rose over the Year.
Percentage of GDP is slightly increasing from 2004 to 2009, and finally roughly constant from 2009 to 2010.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2008 and 2009.
Maximum Percentage of GDP, about 6.22 was reported at Year 2010
Minimum Percentage of GDP about 4.58 was reached at Year 2004
